senses: [{"definition":"To include so that it no longer has separate existence; to overwhelm; to cause to disappear as if by swallowing up; to incorporate; to assimilate; to take in and use up.","example":null},{"definition":"To engulf, as in water; to swallow up.","example":null},{"definition":"To suck up; to drink in; to imbibe, like a sponge or as the lacteals of the body; to chemically take in.","example":null},{"definition":"To take in energy and convert it, as","example":"Heat, light, and electricity are absorbed in the substances into which they pass."},{"definition":"To engross or engage wholly; to occupy fully","example":null},{"definition":"To occupy or consume time.","example":null},{"definition":"Assimilate mentally.","example":null},{"definition":"To assume or pay for as part of a commercial transaction.","example":null},{"definition":"To defray the costs.","example":null},{"definition":"To accept or purchase in quantity.","example":null}]
